name: Break Through (Richard233)
description:
A hard, platforming game made using Godot game engine with black and white, rectangular pixelated art. It’s my first time joining a Ludum Dare event and a game dev event alone; I am very happy to be here. I hope you may like it! ;D

How to play:

A, D keys to control the player to go left or right. If you are using the .exe file on Windows or .dmg file on Mac, you can use esc key to toggle or toggle full screen.

Note:

Please play in full screen mode for better user experience

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/break-through
